title: [HOLD for payment 2023-05-23] [$1000] Assign Task - No focus on Description field in Assign task
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to URL https://staging.new.expensify.com/
2. Login with any Expensifail account
3. Go to FAB -> Assign task
4. Enter a title and NOT enter the description -> click Next
5. Open Description tab

Expected result: Focus present on the Description input field

Actual result: None
